net.sf.jailer.enhancer

Class FileBasedScriptEnhancer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jailer.enhancer.FileBasedScriptEnhancer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScriptEnhancer

    public class FileBasedScriptEnhancer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScriptEnhancer
    Inserts the content of the files
    • prolog/[INSERT|DELETE]/<TABLE>.sql
    • epilog/[INSERT|DELETE]/<TABLE>.sql
    at top/bottom of the generated script for each table <TABLE> for which at least one row is inserted/deleted.
    Author:
    Ralf Wisser
